long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the Lichess Crazyhouse Keyboard Extension: a game-changer for Crazyhouse chess enthusiasts on Lichess.org. Drop captured pieces effortlessly onto the board using intuitive keyboard shortcuts, eliminating the need for drag-and-drop mechanics. With real-time updates, customizable shortcuts, and seamless integration, this extension enhances your gameplay, letting you focus on strategy. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned player, the Crazyhouse Keyboard Extension unlocks new levels of speed and precision, revolutionizing the way you conquer the Crazyhouse chessboard on Lichess.org.
